summary: This is an email chain from May 2020 discussing coordination for a threats investigation, mentioning that an individual is 'on board' and requesting connection with an agent and defense counsel, with background on Mark Epstein.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as someone for whom background information should be provided in the context of a threats investigation.

events.title: Coordination for threats investigation
events.description: Email discussion about connecting an individual who is 'on board' with an agent and defense counsel for a threats investigation, including providing background on Mark Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from late May 2020 discussing a 'threats investigation'.
An individual is described as being 'on board for the threats investigation' and needs to be connected with an agent and defense counsel.
The email instructs the recipient to provide background information regarding Mark Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother, in relation to this investigation.
